         * @returns {number}

     * A comment method
     * @param {number} x
     * @param {number} y
     * @returns {number}
     */
    C1.prototype.method = function (x, y) {
        return x + y;
    }

     * @param {number} x
     * @param {number} y
     * @returns {number}

    C1.staticProp = function (x, y) {
        return x + y;
    }

         * @param {number} x
         * @param {number} y

        method1(x, y) {
            return x + y;
